segments.text: What kind of personality do you think you have ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm quite active and energetic . I approach things enthusiastically and I don't like to leave things half-done .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you think you are introverted or extroverted ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm quite outgoing i think . I enjoy mixing and doing things with others .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What do you think is the most important thing for you to be happy ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I maintain that the most important thing is having good friends . A person can't live all by himself I think . A friend in need is a friend in deed.The more really close friends I have , the better .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What kind of people do you like to work with ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: People who are honest , dedicated to their work and having integrity .
segments.speaker: S2
